title.rendered: Can I Buy a Mobile Phone Without a SIM?

content.rendered:
For a long time, the mobile phone and the SIM card came hand-in-hand. You needed the SIM to be able to get the most from a handset, and you needed the phone itself to contact people. Because of this almost symbiotic relationship, no one challenged the idea that you couldn\’t buy a phone without buying a SIM to go with it.

However, times have changed. With mobile phone contracts and deals currently the standard way to use a phone, people have challenged the status quo. So the question for today is simple. Can you buy a mobile phone without a SIM?

Why Would You Not Want a SIM?

With SIM cards being such a standard part of any mobile experience, understanding why you wouldn\’t suddenly want one is vital. There\’s a couple of different reasons why you might want a mobile phone without a SIM to go with it. First of all, you might already have a SIM with a mobile number and don\’t want or need a new one. You fancy getting yourself a new handset though, so that\’s all you set out to acquire.

Alternatively, you might not need a SIM. The modern smartphone is capable of many things and can serve as a portable tablet or computer for many people. The SIM is sometimes surplus to requirement – all many people need is an internet connection to go online, check emails, run a business and keep up with friends.

What Limitations Exist Without a SIM?

While you can buy mobile phones without a SIM, you will find that there limitations on what you can and cannot do with your device. Understandably, you won\’t be able to make or receive calls and text messages. These are things you can only do with a network connection, and you don\’t have that without a SIM.

Furthermore, you won\’t be able to get any of the various contracts and deals that we offer! Because a handset can be replaced and changed, many people find that the commitment they have is tied directly to the SIM card itself. Without it, you can\’t access any of the benefits such as free calls, texts or the free perks offered by the network providers. You also cannot turn your phone into a portable wifi hotspot either, because it doesn\’t have a source of independent data.

Overall, you can buy a mobile phone without a SIM to go with it. However, you need to understand that there are pros and cons to this. If you\’re someone who\’s going to put a pre-existing SIM into the phone, then you\’re in luck. However, if you\’re someone who wants to be able to get access to a free provision of texts and calls, you may find that this isn\’t possible without a contract.

These mobile phone deals are tied to the SIM itself. It\’s vital to assess your needs when you\’re thinking of buying without a SIM because there are situations where it can be more beneficial to get something with a SIM included.
